description:
A remnant group split off from the http://anidb.net/ch121312 [Pavaria Koumyou Kessha], led by http://anidb.net/ch103347 [Vanessa]. This unit does not officially exist within the Illuminati, being formed after its collapse following http://anidb.net/ch91071 [Adam Weishaupt]`s death.
Source: Symphogear Wiki
name: Noble Red
